question: An amount of 6000 Rs. Lent at 5% per annum compound interest for 2 years will become :
explanation:
$latex A = P(1 + \\frac{R}{100})^{T}&s=1$
$latex = 6000(1 + \\frac{5}{100})^{2}&s=1$
$latex = 6000\\times \\frac{21}{20}\\times \\frac{21}{20} = 6615\\ Rs.&s=1$
Hence option [D] is correct answer.
